metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: Dwelling unit shall be separated from every other space by a separating assembly and adjoining constructions providing an apparent sound transmission class (ASTC) rating of not less than 47
requirements.exact_quote: a separating assembly and adjoining constructions, which together provide an apparent sound transmission class (ASTC) rating of not less than 47

requirements.description: Alternative: separating assembly providing a sound transmission class (STC) rating of not less than 50 with conforming adjoining constructions
requirements.exact_quote: a separating assembly providing a sound transmission class (STC) rating of not less than 50 and adjoining constructions that conform to Article 9.11.1.4

requirements.description: For houses with secondary suite: joist spaces filled with sound-absorbing material of not less than 150mm nominal thickness
requirements.exact_quote: joist spaces are filled with sound-absorbing material of not less than 150mm nominal thickness

requirements.description: For houses with secondary suite: gypsum board not less than 12.7mm thick on ceilings and both sides of walls
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 12.7mm thick gypsum board on ceilings and on both sides of walls

requirements.description: Alternative for secondary suite: construction providing an STC rating of not less than 43
requirements.exact_quote: construction providing an STC rating of not less than 43

requirements.description: Alternative for secondary suite: separating assembly and adjoining constructions providing ASTC rating of not less than 40
requirements.exact_quote: a separating assembly and adjoining constructions, which together provide an ASTC rating of not less than 40

requirements.description: Construction separating dwelling unit from elevator shaft or refuse chute shall have STC rating of not less than 55
requirements.exact_quote: Construction separating a dwelling unit from an elevator shaft or refuse chute shall have an STC rating of not less than 55

requirements.description: STC ratings shall be determined in accordance with ASTM E413 using results from ASTM E90
requirements.exact_quote: STC ratings shall be determined in accordance with ASTM E413, Classification for Rating Sound Insulation, using the results from measurements carried out in accordance with ASTM E90

requirements.description: ASTC ratings shall be determined in accordance with ASTM E413 using results from ASTM E336, or calculated per Article 5.8.1.4 or 5.8.1.5
requirements.exact_quote: ASTC ratings shall be determined in accordance with ASTM E413 using the results from measurements carried out in accordance with ASTM E336

requirements.description: Compliance with required STC ratings demonstrated through measurements per 9.11.1.2.(1) or construction conforming to Table 9.10.3.1.-A or 9.10.3.1.-B
requirements.exact_quote: Compliance with the required STC ratings shall be demonstrated through measurements carried out in accordance with Sentence 9.11.1.2.(1), or the construction of separating assemblies conforming to Table 9.10.3.1.-A or 9.10.3.1.-B

requirements.description: Flanking wall assemblies connected to separating floor/ceiling shall be concrete or concrete block with mass per area greater than 200 kg/m²
requirements.exact_quote: concrete or concrete block having a mass per area greater than 200 kg/m²

requirements.description: Flanking wall and ceiling assemblies connected to separating wall shall be concrete or concrete block with mass per area greater than 300 kg/m²
requirements.exact_quote: concrete or concrete block having a mass per area greater than 300 kg/m²

requirements.description: Flanking floor assemblies connected to separating wall shall be concrete with mass per area greater than 300 kg/m²
requirements.exact_quote: concrete having a mass per area greater than 300 kg/m²
